places.name: Burger King
places.description: Well-known fast-food chain serving grilled burgers, fries & shakes.
places.address: Burger King, 1035 Columbia St, New Westminster, BC V3M 1C4, Canada

featured_reviews.review_id: i payed a small fortune for my meal and to my dismay as we all know the burger fought back and left me  with ketchup and mayo all over my cheekbones. as i reach desperately for a napkin i looked amongst the packets of ketchup and spilled fries and to my surpise no napkin in site . Onlookers laughing at my ketchup and mayo smeared face.full of despair. I embarrassingly wipe myself with the cusp of my newly washed and ironed sleeve. from now on i i will always leave a pack of napkins in my purse as burger king no longer feels delight in feeding customers utmost most import needs!!

featured_reviews.review_id: Really disappointed with my online experience. I was missing dipping sauces with nuggets and cheese sauces as well as a fork with the pie. I called the store and asked them to add mayo packet and still didn't get any. Couldn't enjoy my food
featured_reviews.review_text: Really disappointed with my online experience. I was missing dipping sauces with nuggets and cheese sauces as well as a fork with the pie. I called the store and asked them to add mayo packet and still didn't get any. Couldn't enjoy my food

featured_reviews.review_id:
A very average takeout experience.
The food was average mostly flavourless (I had chicken fries and french fries combo) and I didn't enjoy the food enough to finish it in one sitting.
The staff were fine I guess but the lobby did feel pretty cold.
I won't be going again none of the food seems appealing and the chicken fries were either burnt or just not good overall I am not sure.

featured_reviews.review_id:
This review is about the Burger King in 1035 Columbia St, New Westminster, BC V3M 1C4
Beware:
1.. Twice my grandkids ordered 10 chicken nuggets. The kids came home with only 8 and was charged for 10.  This place cheats

2.  The washroom is only for men and women. If you are a woman who happens to enter the ladies' washroom, you could accidentally meet a man entering the washroom. Why?? because the restaurant closed the men's washroom.

3. The ketchup containers are dirty.
4. The tables are dirty.
5. The people preparing food in the kitchen sneeze and don't wash their hands They don't wear masks.

featured_reviews.review_id: I don't really like Burger King, but this time I saw that there would be "free ice cream" in exchange for a google review. I wrote a shakespearian-esque review, singing praises to the Burger King gods. And yet, I waited 6 minutes for a singular employee to arrive at the front, and when my parched, staving self received my ice cream, it was in a pitiful state; runny, freezer burnt, and a whole other litany of issues. Burger King is common dribble, I pray no human has to experience this ever again.

featured_reviews.review_id: Firstly, I apologize for the large bundle of orders i made, that made you busy, i feel sorry for your attitude after hearing the order. LOL Lastly, please learn a little bit more in speaking English if you would like to provide service. Online order they will make it when you arrive Waited for half an hour and make excuses. Fire those people sept. 24 at 6am. @corporate

featured_reviews.review_id:
Never had a problem here. Food is always standard, but what I love is that they let us order 200 nuggets without much more than a giggle. See the pictures below. What a fun time that was!
Students, if you ever want to celebrate the end of exams this is a great, clean way to go. Your arteries sure won't be clean though.

places.name: Burger King
places.description: Well-known fast-food chain serving grilled burgers, fries & shakes.
places.address: Burger King, 530 6th St, New Westminster, BC V3L 3B1, Canada

featured_reviews.review_id: The 2 for $8 deal is quite attractive; I can buy two Whoppers and an ice-cream cone for less than ten dollars. The Whoppers are juicy and taste good as usual; just the waiting time is a little bit longer, although there were already three staff working in the kitchen
featured_reviews.review_text: The 2 for $8 deal is quite attractive; I can buy two Whoppers and an ice-cream cone for less than ten dollars. The Whoppers are juicy and taste good as usual; just the waiting time is a little bit longer, although there were already three staff working in the kitchen

featured_reviews.review_id: I was there tonight around 9 PM. First of all I couldn't find any clean table and I had to asked some one to clean and sanitize a table. There were 3 people working there and none of them were wearing masks. Their masks were on their chains and necks. When I asked them to wear their masks at least while they are preparing meals, they didn't pay attention at all. I'm sorry for burger king at 6th street because of such an unprofessional staffs. I never come back at all.

featured_reviews.review_id:
No care for food safe or preparation.
Got violently I'll from eating at this particular establishment when the manager was on.
Definitely worried for the next people who decide to eat here.
Let's just say I'd only send someone I wanted sick here

featured_reviews.review_id: They always make everything fresh here but for some reason there's always at least 1 homeless person that comes inside (which could ruin your dining experience)
featured_reviews.review_text: They always make everything fresh here but for some reason there's always at least 1 homeless person that comes inside (which could ruin your dining experience)

featured_reviews.review_id:
I had a question about my bill. Another customer started insulting me. When he started threatening me, I asked the staff to get a manager. There wasn't one. When he threatened to wait in the parking lot, to kill me, I asked staff to call the police. They did not. They DID serve him, take his money, thank him, and ask him to Please Come Back.
This Is BK policy. I stood there, with the police on the phone, while this man, who claimed "the police knew him", ( They most certainly did!) Threatened my life, while waiting for his food.
He was arrested for outstanding violent felony warrants.
This was 5pm, 530 6th st New Westminster. Police file # NW 23 4117
If they care so little about their paying customers that they won't dial 911 when asked, how do you think they treat your food? Of their staff?
Oh, and they STILL TRIED TO OVERCHARGE ME!

featured_reviews.review_id: Food is really good, service was good and fast. Nice inside too. Easy 5 star

featured_reviews.review_id:
Friday evening is always hectic here but the girl at the front counter has always served us with a smile.
I saw her bringing food for the disable man to his table even though he was so rude to her.

featured_reviews.review_id: Unconfortabley hot in the summer. Like most BK's ,it can be challenging to find a clean table. Ever other order seems to be correct, and the workers look overworked and unhappy.
